title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting Satan in the form of a human being in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about Satan hitting a man in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about Satan hitting a man in a dream in order to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence scholars. Interpretation of a dream about hitting Satan in the form of a human being in a dream. Hitting Satan who was present in human form could indicate The end of the crisis that the dreamer suffered during his life at that time. Whoever dreams that he is hitting Satan, it may indicate the end of the envy or eye that fell on him in those days. Beating Satan in a human form in a dream may indicate getting rid of the presence of evil people in the dreamer’s life. Vision during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about beating my grandmother in a dream: Beating my grandmother in a dream may indicate the large sum that the dreamer obtains during this period. It is possible that seeing the grandmother beating in a dream indicates the blessings and good things that the dreamer will receive during this time, and God knows best. Dream interpretation Beating a cat to death in a dream Beating a cat to death in a dream may mean an end to the worries and sadness that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time. In the case of my personal opinion that he was beating the cat to death, this may indicate a rejection of a crisis and a problem that the dreamer was facing in that Time. Killing the cat due to repeated beatings may indicate the end of the injustice that was on the dreamer’s shoulders in those days, and God knows best. In the case of his personal view of beating the cat to death, this may indicate that he stopped the sin that he was doing at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting my maid in a dream: The maid hitting the dreamer in a dream may indicate good things that will come to the dreamer during this time. If one sees the maid hitting him, this may indicate that circumstances have changed for the better, thanks to God. In the event that one sees that The maid hits him, this may indicate wrong decisions made by the dreamer and he must stop them immediately. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a pig in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is hitting a pig, it may indicate that he will get rid of the hostility that was present in his life in the previous period. Hitting a pig in a dream It can indicate approaching the Blessed and Almighty God, and stopping the sins and disobedience that the dreamer was committing at that time. Dreaming of a pig in a dream may indicate the end of the financial crisis that the dreamer faced in his life during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he was beating a pig may indicate To happy events that come to the dreamer after suffering, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of beating a thief in a dream. Anyone who dreams of beating a thief can indicate the strength and courage of the dreamer at that time. Beating a thief in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals thanks to God. In the event that a person says that he was He hits the thief, as this may indicate approaching God Almighty, and he stops

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing jeans in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing jinn in a dream: Jinn are creatures that live in our world but we cannot see them or talk to them. They are supernatural beings and our natural senses cannot deal with them in a certain space, but what is the significance of seeing jeans in a dream? ; What is the meaning of this vision? There are many associations that vary based on different considerations, which we will focus on in this article in more detail. Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing jeans in a dream Jeans in a dream Seeing jeans in a dream represents distress, adversity, sadness, successive crises, difficulties in life, and harsh circumstances. This vision is a reflection The fears that control a person’s life and push him to isolation and concealment, which affects him negatively and wastes many opportunities. The jinn in a dream symbolizes the persistent and cunning enemy from which all problems and harms stem. Seeing jeans also indicates whims and personal desires that push a person to... Walking in unfavorable ways, then falling into a lifestyle of indifference. On the other hand, seeing jeans is a sign of a deteriorating psychological state, following illusions, clinging to false hopes, and exaggerating life’s issues and events. In this regard, the vision is a sign of disappointment. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a jinn indicates a cunning person heading towards deception in order to achieve his goals without regard to any other considerations. This vision also suggests indulging in The world and desire for it, following desires, falling into traps and machinations, and forgetting the afterlife. Ibn Sirin has an explanation for the vision of the jinn, which is that his vision expresses deception, because the word “jinn” refers to people skilled in the art of deception and deception and easily getting what they want. Also, Seeing jinn expresses shortcomings in worship, preoccupation with falsehood with the truth, dealing with people of falsehood and corruption, and aversion to people of truth and piety. If a person sees jinn in a place, the person with the vision may be harmed if he is in that place. Whoever sees the jinn whispers to him and tries to control his heart. This indicates that the dreamer is one of the people of righteousness and piety. The vision in its entirety is a reminder to the individual of his duties and worship and to abandon the world and stay away from its joys as much as possible. Jinn in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq says that seeing the jinn expresses forbidden means, forbidden desires, obnoxious behavior, and satisfying Desires without respecting the provisions of Sharia. Seeing jeans in a dream is a sign of abandoning religion, entering into heresies and deviant ideas, spreading lies, spreading doubts in souls, and mixing falsehood with truth. This vision also indicates the necessity of obedience, returning to God and repenting from Him, abandoning evil, and everything else. A person derives it from pleasure, heading to the path and the right path, and following instinct. If one sees that jeans are stealing his clothes, this indicates a great loss, loss of status and relationship,

title: The 9 most important interpretations of seeing dogs in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing dogs barking in a dream? It indicates the presence of many enemies. Interpretation of seeing a dog biting in a dream? Evidence of the dreamer’s defeat. What is the interpretation of someone who sees a group of dogs barking? Shows hostility from many people in his life. Interpretation of seeing pregnant dogs in a dream? Proof of safety and loyalty. What is the interpretation of a married woman if she sees a dog chasing her in her sleep? It indicates her poor choice of some characters. Seeing dogs is only for dogs. To see dogs in a dream for a married woman, this indicates a certain significance because it indicates safety and security. It indicates security, guarding, and comfort. Which the girl gets from the man during her next period of life, whether related or unrelated. As for the unmarried girl who sees a dog approaching her to chase her, this indicates betrayal that will happen to her from some people. Then, if the girl is in a relationship with someone and dreams With a dog chasing her during her sleep, this indicates his betrayal. Interpretation of seeing dogs for a married woman: As for the case in which a married woman saw a dog chasing her during her sleep, this indicates the poor choice of some characters. But a married woman who sees a loyal dog in her dream shows a certain indicator, which is the extent of The comfort that her husband will provide her in her married life. Seeing a calm dog in a dream means protection and security during her life. Interpretation of seeing pregnant dogs: Seeing a pregnant woman with dogs in a dream indicates many signs, including security and loyalty. A calm dog in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates To her good choices in life. As for the dog that chases a pregnant woman in her dream, it shows her bad choices and complains about them a lot. Seeing a dog bite in a dream Seeing a dreamer with a dog biting him in a dream confirms the quality of bad owners in his life who want to harm him. A dog bite in a dream indicates defeat. Which the dreamer will receive during the coming period. Interpretation of eating dog meat: Seeing a person in a dream eating dog meat means punishing the biggest enemy in his life. As for drinking dog milk, it confirms the panic, horror, and intimidation that he sees in his life. Seeing a wild dog in a dream confirms that a man or A girl who sees a wild dog in a dream means that there are many enemies for the dreamer. A wild dog in a dream shows the blueness and wealth that God gives to the dreamer. If a person dreams of a group of dogs barking in his dream, this indicates the hostility of many people in his life and he should beware of them. Barking dogs In a dream, it indicates the presence of many enemies. Joy in a dream, seeing grilled fish, shrimp in a dream, lentils in a dream, seeing raw fish, suicide in a dream, vomiting in a dream, feces in a dream, a date in a dream, a snake in a dream, someone you love several times, interpretation of seeing dead people, ants in a dream, jeans in a dream

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake attacking me according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake attacking me Snakes are dreams that some people see and cause them distress and sadness as a result of the harm they cause to the person in reality, and therefore they immediately think that seeing them harms him as well. We explain in our article the interpretation of a dream about a snake attacking me Interpretation of a dream about a snake attacking me What is the interpretation of a dream when a snake attacks me? Seeing snakes is not one of the dreamer's reassuring visions, especially if it approaches the person and attacks or chases him. Most experts say that the snake's attack on the dreamer has signs of malice and cunning that some hide from him, and therefore the person must monitor those around him and focus on their actions while watching the dream. The closer we get to the person in his vision, the evil is clear to him, the enemy is close and very harmful, such as a family member or a friend. Experts rely on a different interpretation of the dream, which is the color of the snake, because each color has a specific meaning that it indicates, for example, the yellow snake carries the meaning of envy and serious harm resulting from illness. The person is affected in his personal life by the snake attacking him in a dream, especially if it bites him, and this results in Tension in his relationship with those around him, especially with his life partner. He should beware of some women around him. As for the snake that bites the girl in her dream, it is a treacherous or cunning person who wishes her harm and is waiting for an opportunity to spoil her happiness or tarnish her good behavior. Interpretation of a dream about a snake attacking me by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that snakes attacking the visionary in his dream is direct evidence of the abundance of enemies and the multiplicity of their evil qualities that are likely to cause great harm to the person, especially with their bite. He says that the large snake that accompanies the person and is close to him depicts the closeness of the lying and deceitful person to the visionary who hides evil and sadness to watch him. As for the large snake that enters the house and attacks his family, it expresses the presence of a family member who hides evil and evil from those around him and does not think about forming a good relationship, but rather carries the opposite. As for the fear of chasing snakes in a dream, it shows something different, which is the strength of the unique and strong personality present in the owner of the dream, which will make him a bright future and great days ahead. Ibn Sirin considers that dealing with snakes wisely and not chasing them is beneficial to the person because it shows The high power that a person acquires in addition to the great position he occupies among people. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google on the Egyptian dream interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by the most important jurists of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a snake attacking me Different connotations associated with the snake attacking a girl, if it is a black snake, it represents a cunning enemy, full of malice and envy, who may be close to her and may be a friend who shows his loyalty. If the girl is stung or bitten and she suffers from severe pain in the dream, it is expected that she will be severely harmed by those around her in the near future, and she must protect herself and defend herself strongly. As for chasing a white snake, it indicates that a person with bad behavior is approaching him trying to harm him. You may find

title: Interpretation of a dream about receiving wheat from someone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of receiving wheat from someone in a dream. Some may want to know the interpretation of the dream of receiving wheat from someone in a dream, and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation. Let us get acquainted with the interpretations of diligent scholars about this dream, and the reader should know that those in charge of the site do not provide interpretations, but from the heart the interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about receiving wheat from someone in a dream Taking wheat from someone in a dream may indicate good character that The dreamer is enjoying it at this time, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of receiving wheat from a man in a dream indicates the abundance of money that the dreamer can obtain and the enormous livelihood thanks to God. If a person sees wheat from a man in a dream, this may indicate To take care of it and not spend it on things that are not useful in those days, and God knows best. Seeing taking wheat from someone in a dream could indicate that he is a good person and that he is a person of good character, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about collecting ears of corn in a dream. Picking ears of corn in a dream may indicate The goodness that the dreamer may attain in his life during this period, and God knows best. If a person sees that he is collecting ears of corn in a dream, this may indicate his success in studying or working during those days, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing harvesting corn in the dream It indicates the ability to achieve the desires and dreams that its owner wanted to achieve during this period. Seeing harvesting ears of corn in a dream may indicate the happiness that may befall the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking in wheat fields in a dream: Walking in wheat fields may indicate Wheat in a dream indicates a wide life that the dreamer will have in his life in those days, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing one walking in wheat fields in a dream indicates good events that may happen to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision is Walking in wheat fields in a dream indicates an increase in the knowledge that the dreamer enjoys during this period, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing walking on wheat in a dream indicates a profitable trade that the dreamer may acquire during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about receiving wheat from The dead in a dream: Taking wheat from the dead in a dream may indicate gifts that may come to the dreamer’s life during this time, thanks to God. Receiving wheat from the dead in a dream may indicate the happiness that the dreamer enjoys in his life during this time. In the event that If a person saw that the dead person was eating wheat, this may indicate the good changes and happiness that the visionary enjoyed in his life at that time. Seeing receiving wheat from the dead person in a dream could indicate positive changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating wheat in a dream: Eating raw wheat in a dream may indicate that he is a person who bears a lot of responsibility in those days. It is possible that seeing eating wheat in a dream indicates saving money without spending money.

title: Interpretation of seeing grapes in a dream: A bunch of grapes in a dream

preview.html: Seeing grapes for a single woman for a pregnant woman, a married woman, a divorced woman, a married woman, or a young man, whether black, green, or red, picked from a tree, buys sweet, sour, fresh, spoiled food. There are many on the authority of Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and al-Nabul. Interpretation of grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the grapes have a strong skin, this means that he obtains money through effort and effort. He said Al-Kirmani: Black grapes in their season are good, and may portend slight anxiety, and in addition to illness, sadness and fear in their season, white grapes in their season are praiseworthy, and at the end of their time there is sadness. Ibn Sirin said: White grapes in their season are interpreted by rain and dew, and eating them in Its season is evidence of what is permissible. And whoever sees that he ate white grapes in his time, then it is a blessing, goodness, benefit, and fulfillment of what he wished for, and if it was not in his time, and he sees this praise, then it is good. And money is permissible, and red grapes are equivalent. Whoever dreams that he buys grapes or juice will obtain goodness, and raisins of any color are good and beneficial to the one who eats them, and perhaps sour grapes are forbidden for money or illness. And whoever sees that he is picking a handful, he has taken a sum of money from the woman, and picked Grapes are an inheritance from his wife, and as for a single cluster, it is a thousand dirhams. And whoever sees grapes in a language other than Arabic, it is interpreted as bad money, so let the fortuneteller think about what he sees and what he says from his vision. If it is thin and its water is pure: it is an indication of lawful money, and every grape’s water changes. It contains forbidden money, and every red grape has honor and dignity, and every grape is sweeter and purer. It indicates an increase in benefit, money and price. And whoever sees black grapes hanging from his vine at the wrong time, it will be interpreted as extreme cold and fear, and perhaps it is money that the fortuneteller does not get. Eating communal grapes is evidence of the difficulty of earning money. The vineyard in the dream shows the woman because it is a good and sweet drink. Taste. He is the king of generosity and he was single and married. As for black grapes in their season, they are disliked, and some of them indicate illness or fear, and green grapes in their season show the juice of the world, its joys, and its gifts, and when there is no money. Which the fortuneteller receives before its expected date. Grape juice in a dream indicates what the dreamer will receive from a generous ruler or sultan. As for the bouquet, it indicates the amount of money. Whoever sees that he is taking it or collecting it, he will be affected by the money to the extent that he saw the grapes. And the bunch of grapes in The interpretation is one of the clear symbols that indicate money and its benefits. It was also said that if black grapes indicate money in the dream, then it is not permanent, and if a man sees it hanging, then it shows the woman. If the dreamer is a woman, then the cluster of grapes hanging from the vine indicates the husband. Some say Interpreters: Black grapes in a dream are not rejected, for God Almighty says in Surat Al-Nal: And from the fruits of palm trees and grapes you will obtain sugar and good sustenance from them. And Zechariah found it with Mary, peace be upon her, because it is praiseworthy. It is said in the narratives that grapes were next to Noah’s son when his father called for him. Before that, it was white, and when it changed color, the grapes around it changed. Ibn Sirin says: As long as the fruit does not break every season and does not have time or substance to spoil, it is good.
preview.text: Seeing grapes for a single woman for a pregnant woman, a married woman, a divorced woman, a married woman, or a young man, whether black, green, or red, picked from a tree, buys sweet, sour, fresh, spoiled food. There are many on the authority of Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and al-Nabul. Interpretation of grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the grapes have a strong skin, this means that he obtains money through effort and effort. He said Al-Kirmani: Black grapes in their season are good, and may portend slight anxiety, and in addition to illness, sadness and fear in their season, white grapes in their season are praiseworthy, and at the end of their time there is sadness. Ibn Sirin said: White grapes in their season are interpreted by rain and dew, and eating them in Its season is evidence of what is permissible. And whoever sees that he ate white grapes in his time, then it is a blessing, goodness, benefit, and fulfillment of what he wished for, and if it was not in his time, and he sees this praise, then it is good. And money is permissible, and red grapes are equivalent. Whoever dreams that he buys grapes or juice will obtain goodness, and raisins of any color are good and beneficial to the one who eats them, and perhaps sour grapes are forbidden for money or illness. And whoever sees that he is picking a handful, he has taken a sum of money from the woman, and picked Grapes are an inheritance from his wife, and as for a single cluster, it is a thousand dirhams. And whoever sees grapes in a language other than Arabic, it is interpreted as bad money, so let the fortuneteller think about what he sees and what he says from his vision. If it is thin and its water is pure: it is an indication of lawful money, and every grape’s water changes. It contains forbidden money, and every red grape has honor and dignity, and every grape is sweeter and purer. It indicates an increase in benefit, money and price. And whoever sees black grapes hanging from his vine at the wrong time, it will be interpreted as extreme cold and fear, and perhaps it is money that the fortuneteller does not get. Eating communal grapes is evidence of the difficulty of earning money. The vineyard in the dream shows the woman because it is a good and sweet drink. Taste. He is the king of generosity and he was single and married. As for black grapes in their season, they are disliked, and some of them indicate illness or fear, and green grapes in their season show the juice of the world, its joys, and its gifts, and when there is no money. Which the fortuneteller receives before its expected date. Grape juice in a dream indicates what the dreamer will receive from a generous ruler or sultan. And the bunch of grapes in The interpretation is one of the clear symbols that indicate money and its benefits. If the dreamer is a woman, then the cluster of grapes hanging from the vine indicates the husband. Some say Interpreters: Black grapes in a dream are not rejected, for God Almighty says in Surat Al-Nal: And from the fruits of palm trees and grapes you will obtain sugar and good sustenance from them. title: The most important and accurate 70 interpretations of a dream about a husband being imprisoned in a dream by leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband being imprisoned in a dream: The husband is the breadwinner and caretaker of the family, and imprisonment or absence for any reason is a bad and tragic accident for all family members, especially for the wife who is obligated to bear responsibility alone. If a woman sees this dream in her dream? We will be able to explain this in detail through today’s topic. Interpretation of a dream about imprisoning a husband in a dream: Seeing an imprisoned husband in a dream is evidence that he is exposed to many crises in his life and that he bears responsibilities that exceed his capabilities. On the contrary, it is characterized by selfishness and leaves the entire burden on the husband's shoulders. The dream could be a sign of the accumulation of problems for the dreamer and imprisonment at times due to the accumulation of debts. Imprisonment in the dreamer's dream means the inconveniences and tensions that the dreamer suffers from, and his inability to deal with them alone If he sees that he has been released from prison in a dream, this is evidence that he has overcome the difficulties and obstacles facing him. Dreaming of his husband being imprisoned in a dream shows the worries and pains that befall the dreamer, the suffering that the husband feels, and the absence of someone standing beside him, as if he is carving on the rock alone. Seeing a prison The husband in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The vision from Ibn Sirin’s point of view shows the husband’s distance from his wife and family, or that there is a great sin that he commits, and the blessing is taken away from his livelihood and his children. But if someone sees in a dream that he is building a prison for himself and is truly sick, then his death will come soon, and God is Most High. And I know. If the husband himself goes to prison, this is evidence of his strong desire to repent from sins and transgressions. As for the traveler who wants to return to his family, there are many obstacles that prevent him from returning. If the dreamer is in good health, his vision may indicate a health illness that will pass in the future. Seeing prison in The dream, from the point of view of Imam Nabulsi, is evidence of extreme anxiety and anxiety that may be difficult to get rid of. As for whoever sees that he is in prison, he will fall into a great position in the near future, especially if he is unjustly imprisoned. However, if he sees himself imprisoned in a strange place, then he does not He knows its location, then this represents the grave. Ibn Shaheen said: If the seer is a celebrity, explaining his vision of a prison in a dream, as a corruption of the seer’s morals, love of fun in this world, and indifference to the afterlife. But if the seer is not a famous person, he will receive a lot of Goodness, but there are some obstacles that prevent this goodness, which he obtains in the end after hardships. Ibn Shaheen also said: Whoever sees himself locked in his house with his hands and legs tied, then it is the bliss and happiness that he lives among his family members and the close relationship between the spouses. But if The dreamer saw a prisoner, then he is exposed to some hypocrites who conspire against him and cause him a lot of trouble, and he may be exposed to the temptation of women, which

title: What is the interpretation of gray hair in a dream and what is the meaning of Ibn Sirin's vision of it? What is the interpretation of a dream about a young child with white hair? What is the interpretation of a dream about gray hair in a beard?

preview.html: Interpretation of gray hair in a dream: Gray hair is the appearance of white hair on the head between the black hair, or the turning of all of a person’s black hair into white, and it is a sign and indication of advancing age, and this is what accompanies this progress in pride and rise in position and status. And dignity. Seeing this white hair in a dream can indicate many meanings. It can indicate other meanings, such as the occurrence of a disaster or problems that people face. What is the interpretation of gray hair in a dream? The scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing human hair growing again in a dream may indicate To the proximity of the situation. Seeing hair, which is very small and becoming very white, may mean to the dreamer that there is a disaster that may happen soon, or it may befall a member of his family or relatives, or something very dear to him, and if the owner of the dream is a seeker of knowledge, his vision of gray hair It may indicate success, success, and payment. If the dreamer sees gray hair spread on his beard hair or the hair of another person’s beard, this may indicate that the dreamer feels sad and distressed, and the amount of this sadness is the same as the amount of dye on his beard hair. If a pregnant woman dreams that she has a child And this child began to gray his hair, and this surprised her. The dream could be a sign of good nutrition on the way to him, and if the young man sees in his dream that he is dyeing his hair. White hair may indicate many good things that God will give him. If a young woman sees in her dream that her hair is whiter than grey, this may mean a lot of goodness on her way. What is the interpretation of gray hair in Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream? Imam Al-Sadiq believes that the interpretation of gray hair in a dream has multiple connotations. Among them is that the meaning of white hair or gray hair comes from the concepts of aging, which are wisdom and dignity, and it can indicate pride, high status, and high status, such as a gray man in his family or people. Seeing gray hair can indicate a person who is separated from his family and homeland and is On the way back. If the dreamer is divorced and sees her hair turning gray or white and her husband is present in the dream, she will feel that her condition will improve soon and the dream may mean that her affairs will become easier for her better than they were, and if she sees that she has completely cut her hair, then she may This means that she will get rid of a large number of problems surrounding her life. If a man sees that gray hair has invaded his head and it has become completely white in a short time, this may indicate a lot of goodness on the way to him, because gray hair is a sign of pride and wisdom that the person has achieved. After a long experience in life.What is the interpretation of a dream about gray hair for a married woman?Interpretation of a dream about gray hair for a married womanIf a married woman sees that her husband has come in her dream, with white hair covering his head and gray hair, this may indicate that he will occupy an important position and a high position in his work or among his people And he will be trusted. Great duties. As for seeing her children’s hair all white, this indicates that they will excel in their studies and pass exams with high numbers and grades. What is the interpretation of gray hair in a place?

title: Interpretation of a dream about cooked beans

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of cooked beans in a dream We will present below the interpretation of a dream of cooked beans in a dream and what it means according to the interpretations of scholars and commentators, not personal interpretations. All this and more details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream of cooked beans in a dream Interpretation of a dream of cooked beans in a dream can express praiseworthy things, God willing. However, if the dreamer sees cooked beans, it may indicate good news, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees cooked beans, it may indicate happiness, and God knows the unseen. Buying cooked beans can also indicate goodness and nutrition, and God knows best Interpretation of a dream of eating beans with eggs in a dream Interpretation of a dream of eating beans with eggs in a dream Eating cooked beans indicates goodness and happiness, God willing. Likewise, if a married man sees himself eating cooked beans and they taste good, this may indicate goodness and care, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Likewise, if the dreamer sees himself buying beans from a large market, this may lead to exhaustion and misery in earning money and living, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When you see a married man buying beans, this may indicate the satisfaction of desires, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When you see a single girl buying beans, this may be a marriage, and God knows best. Whereas if the dreamer sees eating dry beans without soaking them in water, this may lead to earning money after hard work, and God knows best. Seeing soaking dry beans can also represent healing the causes of anxiety, and God is Most High and All-Knowing.
